allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Design System Template

Complete portable design system with:
- UI components \(Alert, Badge, Button, Card, Label, RadioGroup\)
- Design tokens \(colors, typography, shadows\)
- Interactive styleguide documentation
- Full dark mode support
- Next.js 16 + TailwindCSS + Radix UI

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo create fit-tracker --public --description "Portable design system template built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and shadcn/ui" --source=. --push)
